channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Utah NHL Team Releases 20 Possible Names, Fan Vote Begins
item.description: Utah’s new NHL franchise has released its list of twenty team names it is considering for its inaugural 2024-25 season. Fans can vote for up to four of the twenty finalists on their ballot but can only cast one ballot. Voting starts tonight and will conclude after two weeks on

item.title: Patrick Beverley Under Police Investigation For Ball-Throwing Incident
item.description: Cops are now looking into the Patrick Beverley ball-throwing incident ... confirming to TMZ Sports on Wednesday the NBA player is currently under police investigation. A spokesperson for the Indianapolis Metropolitan Police Department tells us ...…

item.title: Burnley FC Leave Umbro, Sign Kit Deal With Castore
item.description: Burnley currently in Premier League relegation zone; if they stay up, they'll be one of two clubs in England's top flight outfitted by Castore

item.title: Andy Cohen Denies Rumors He and John Mayer Are Hooking Up
item.description: Andy Cohen swears he doesn't know if John Mayer's body's a wonderland ... as he tries to put rumors to rest he and the Grammy winner are getting it on. The King of Bravo sat down and addressed it head-on when he was asked about longstanding…

item.title: Report: Brazil Could Ditch Nike as Kit Supplier After Receiving Massive Offer
item.description: Brazilian news outlet reports CBF has received an offer worth more than five times what Nike currently pays them from either Adidas or Puma

item.title: Farrah Abraham Seems to Shade Jenelle Evans 'Teen Mom' Return
item.description: Farrah Abraham never seems to miss an opportunity to roast her nemesis Jenelle Evans ... and she kinda did again for her going back to 'Teen Mom' ... albeit, very politely. The former reality star and content creator posted a video Wednesday that…

item.title: USL’s Orange County Try to Capture Magic with New Cup Kit
item.description: Kit is inspired by designs worn in 1910s, when U.S. Open Cup started, and will be worn when OCSC takes on Loudoun United in Round of 32 on Tuesday, May 7

item.title: Shohei Ohtani's Interpreter Pleading Guilty To Federal Charges, Facing Up To 33 Yrs
item.description: Shohei Ohtani's ex-translator and best friend, Ippei Mizuhara, will plead guilty to multiple federal charges -- after admitting to taking nearly $17 million from the Dodgers superstar -- and now faces up to 3+ decades in prison! On Wednesday, The…

item.title: Panama Football Unveils New National Team Crest
item.description: Crest depicts a harpy eagle — the national bird of Panama — with each feather representing one of the country's 10 provinces

item.title: Paris Hilton & Nicole Richie Reuniting for New Reality TV Show
item.description: Paris Hilton and Nicole Richie are getting ready to be reality TV stars all over again -- 'cause the 2000s darlings are teaming up anew to run it back ... but for a whole new project. Production sources tell TMZ ... Paris and Nicole are both on…
